channel.title: ZodiacsReign 9.0 Re-Release
channel.description:
He gave me permission to re-release this, I use a lot of the things in here for references. [quote="Z 0 D I A C, post:1, topic:316506"][ul][list][list][list][list][center][Img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2u6mw02.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://s4.tinypic.com/10dfnnc_th.jpg[/img] [size=20pt][b]Number one In RSPS Packs[/b][/size][/center] [center][b][i]What is ZodiacsReign?[/i] [b][font=Verdana]ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, Zodiacsreign has been around for almost 2 years and I've been updating for a very long time. In "ZodiacsReign Packages" you will find Tools, Id List , Essentials to make your private server experience a better one.[/b][/center] [color=maroon] [center][b][i] [color=blue]In the new ZodiacsReign 9.0, This is the anniversary edition, I had no idea what to add to this to make it special, But the fact is that today is the day I released ZodiacsReign into the RSPS World. Thank you for downloading this if you did. [/b][/center]
[Center][size=20pt]Download Link~[/size] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/vxja6e.jpg[/img] http://www.mediafire.com/?lzyzwzkwnnm[b] 17.55mb[/b] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/free-file-hosting/mediafire-swoosh.gif[/img] [/center]
[center] [b]What's new? Ventrillo Installation for Mac, Windows & Linux New Auto-Restarter New Command Maker New Character Editor New 525 List's New Price Checker Application Java Fixer Runescape Music for Clients Menu Maker Swiftkit Client Equipment Builder RsClient 317 Autospawn Editor [/b]
[Center][i][size=11pt][b]Features[/b][/center] [center] [b][size=12pt]317 List[/b] [list] [color=orange][list][li]317 Item List[/li][/list] [list][li]317 NPC List[/li] [li]317 Interface List[/li] [li]317 Graphics List[/li] [li]317 Object List[/li] [li]317 Emote List [/li] [li]317 Coordinate List [/li] [li]317 Animation List [/li] [li]And More[/li][/list]
[b][size=12pt][color=green]508 List[/b] [list][li]508 Interface List[/li] [li]508 NPC List [/li] [li]508 Object List[/li] [li]508 Item List[/li] [li]508 Graphics List[/li] [li]508 Hair & Clothes Color List[/li] [li]508 Emotes List[/li] [li]508 Sounds List [/li][/list]
[b][size=12pt][color=blue]Tools[/b] [list][li]Eleclions Server Rebooter[/li] [li]Meiscooldudes Shopmaker & Server Runetime Manager[/li] [li]Hypercam Set-Up[/li] [li]Basic Command Generator[/li] [li]Voule's Auto-Restarter[/li] [li]Voule's Command Generator [/li] [li]Voule's Auto-spawn Generator[/li] [li]Backup Tool[/li] [li]Character Editor[/li] [li]Runescape Windows Client[/li] [li]WinterLove Server[/li] [li]Brand new Shop-Maker[/li] [li]Sprite-Maker[/li] [li]Moparscape Client[/li] [li]Server Item Clearer[/li] [li]525 Item List[/li] [li]Auto-typer & Auto-clicker[/li] [li]And More[/li] [li]More tools then before![/li] [/list]
[b][size=14pt]Picture[/size][/b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ivo5md.jpg[/img] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/zvo9s2.jpg[/img][/center]
[Center]
[size=12pt][b]Virus Scan(s)[/b][/size] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/20jfdhs.jpg[/img] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/331hyf6.png[/img]
[size=19pt]Credits[/size] [b][size=8pt] Cocoa Hidendra The Soul Galkon Jagex LTD SilabSoft Jordan of Pur3z-Scape Justin of Pur3z-Scape Jeremy Yak Voule Meiscooldudes GalkonsPride Community BytyIsle Community Moparscape Community RuneLimited Community A Censored Community Pur3z-Scape Community PloxageScape Community[/size][/b] [Img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2u6mw02.png[/img][center]
[center][i]ZodiacsReign 9.0 was made by Z 0 D I A C[/i][/center]
[color=white][/list][/list][/list][/list][/list][/ul][/quote]

item.title: ZodiacsReign 9.0 Re-Release
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

He gave me permission to re-release this, I use a lot of the things in here for references.

[quote=“Z 0 D I A C, post:1, topic:316506”][ul][list][list][list][list][center][/center]
[center]
[size=20pt]Number one In RSPS Packs[/size][/center]
[center][b]What is ZodiacsReign?
[font=Verdana]ZodiacsReign is a RSPS helper containing mostly required programs and files to make your RSPS coding and playing more proficient and easy, Zodiacsreign has been around for almost 2 years and I’ve been updating for a very long time. In “ZodiacsReign Packages” you will find Tools, Id List , Essentials to make your private server experience a better one.[/center]
[color=maroon]
[center][i] [color=blue]In the new ZodiacsReign 9.0, This is the anniversary edition, I had no idea what to add to this to make it special, But the fact is that today is the day I released ZodiacsReign into the RSPS World. Thank you for downloading this if you did. [/center]

[Center][size=20pt]Download Link~[/size]

http://www.mediafire.com/?lzyzwzkwnnm 17.55mb

[/center]

[center]
What’s new?
Ventrillo Installation for Mac, Windows & Linux
New Auto-Restarter
New Command Maker
New Character Editor
New 525 List’s
New Price Checker Application
Java Fixer
Runescape Music for Clients
Menu Maker
Swiftkit Client
Equipment Builder
RsClient
317 Autospawn Editor

[Center][i][size=11pt]Features[/center]
[center]
